sql-statement.sql: select opinionModel.*,userModel.displayName
from op_opinion opinionModel left join op_user userModel on opinionModel.createdBy = userModel.id where 1 = 1 <% commonSql("com.common.params",filters!,sorts!); %>

select opinionVerifyFollowModel.*,userModel.displayName,departmentModel.name as departmentName from op_opinion_verify_follow opinionVerifyFollowModel left join op_user userModel on opinionVerifyFollowModel.userId = userModel.id left join op_department departmentModel on userModel.departmentId = departmentModel.id where opinionId = ${opinionId}

select opinionToDoFollowModel.*,userModel.displayName,departmentModel.name as departmentName from op_opinion_todo_follow opinionToDoFollowModel left join op_user userModel on opinionToDoFollowModel.userId = userModel.id left join op_department departmentModel on userModel.departmentId = departmentModel.id where opinionId = ${opinionId}

select opinionInstructionModel.*,userModel.displayName,departmentModel.name as departmentName from op_opinion_instruction opinionInstructionModel left join op_user userModel on opinionInstructionModel.userId = userModel.id left join op_department departmentModel on userModel.departmentId = departmentModel.id where opinionId = ${opinionId}
from op_opinion opinionModel left join op_user userModel on opinionModel.createdBy = userModel.id where 1 = 1 and hasInstruction = 1 <% commonSql("com.common.params",filters!,sorts!); %>

from op_opinion opinionModel left join op_user userModel on opinionModel.createdBy = userModel.id where 1 = 1 and hasInstruction = 1 and opinionModel.type=2 <% commonSql("com.common.params",filters!,sorts!); %>

from op_opinion opinionModel left join op_user userModel on opinionModel.createdBy = userModel.id where 1 = 1 and hasInstruction = 1 and opinionModel.type=3 <% commonSql("com.common.params",filters!,sorts!); %>
select * from op_opinion where isPublic = 1 and enabled =1
select * from op_opinion where sourceId = '${sourceId}'
select * from op_opinion_todo where opinionId = ${opinionId};
select * from op_opinion_verify where opinionId = ${opinionId};
select * from op_opinion where isPublic = 1 and enabled =1 and type=2
select * from op_opinion where isPublic = 1 and enabled =1 and type=3
